segments.text: Who stands out in your mind as a man or woman of sound character ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If I think of famous people , I think of Abraham Lincoln .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He's the US president , who walked five miles just to give a lady her change , isn't he ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's the one . He also was famous for never giving up on his goals .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's right . He ran for office quite a few times before he was finally elected .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And I also admire him for his courage in fighting for equal rights .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He had great vision , didn't he ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And humility . I would have liked to meet him personally .
segments.speaker: S2
